author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-C-RAD Signs Strategic Agreement To Equip ZON PTC
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - C-RAD AB:
* PTC, A MAASTRO CLINIC COMPANY, IN MAASTRICHT, NETHERLANDS FOR CATALYST PT
* PROJECT IS EXPECTED TO BE FINALIZED BY END OF YEAR. * ANNOUNCED TODAY THAT IT IS ENTERING INTO A COLLABORATION WITH ZUID-OOST NEDERLAND PROTONEN THERAPIE CENTRUM (ZON-PTC)
* PROJECT IS BOOKED AS ORDER INTAKE IN Q1 * THIS ORDER IS OF STRATEGIC IMPORTANCE FOR C-RAD AND HAS A VALUE OF APPROX. 3 MSEK
* FIRST SYSTEM IS INSTALLED IN APRIL 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
